name: Market Size Validation
description: TAM should be at least $1B for venture funding
message: Target addressable market appears small. Consider if venture funding is appropriate.

name: Growth Rate Threshold
description: Expected growth rate should exceed market growth
message: Growth rate lower than market growth. Review competitive positioning.

name: Unit Economics Validation
description: LTV should be at least 3x CAC for healthy unit economics
message: Unit economics are unsustainable. LTV must be at least 3x CAC.

name: Funding Adequacy
description: Runway should be at least 18 months with current burn
message: Runway is short. Consider funding strategy revision.

name: Team Depth
description: Founding team should have complementary skills
message: Consider diversifying founding team expertise (technical, commercial, product).

name: Market Validation
description: Should validate market with customer interviews before launch
message: Insufficient customer validation. Conduct at least 50 customer interviews.
